snippet: The cable news channel threw everything it had on Thursday at the odyssey of the Carnival Cruise Line ship Triumph, which was being towed toward port in Mobile, Ala., after four days stranded at sea.
abstract: The cable news channel threw everything it had on Thursday at the odyssey of the Carnival Cruise Line ship Triumph, which was being towed toward port in Mobile, Ala., after four days stranded at sea.

headline.main: For CNN, Cruise Ship Coverage by 'Air, Land and Sea'
